item.description:
Please join us for the Friends of Beverly Animals (FOBA) 3rd Annual Funky Fur Ball. It will be a fun evening for all! Live music by our favorite band    "Don't Call Me Shirley!"

 

9.19.11 UPDATE: Remember to order your ticket in advance, the contact email address is below, this is the last week to get your ticket and there is no guarantee that they will sell tickets at the door!  

If you have your ticket and haven't updated the site yet, please do so we reserve tables for ALL of us! 

If you plans have changed and you are NOT able to attend please come back to the site and remove your RSVP!

 

9.6.11 UPDATE: Remember to order your ticket, we have been told that tickets may not be available at the door, also come back and change your RSVP to let us know that you have your ticket, so we reserve tables for the right amount of people!!

What you need to know about this meetup:

  • Dinner is at 7:30 pm
  • They will have raffles and auction items
  • Casual Dress
  • Cash Bar
  • Tickets are $25.00 (YOU are responsible of getting your own ticket.)
  • Proceeds to benefit the feeding and medical care of homeless animals and long-term goal of establishing an animal shelter in Beverly.
  • To order your ticket call Bonnie @ 978-922-7190 or foba2007@gmail.com

 

  • Please remember to come back and let us know that you have ordered your ticket and so we can get a table(s) reserved.

 

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Come into the hall and find us.
item.name: Funky Fur Ball
